channel.title: SHRM Online: HR News
channel.description: Daily news and information provided by the Society for Human Resource Management (SHRM)

item.title: Compliance with 'No-Match' Rule Urged
item.description: The government regulation on Social Security 'no-match' letters is in limbo following a court challenge, but some legal experts advise complying with it anyway.

item.title: HR Studies Students' High-Def Mindset
item.description: This year's crop of incoming college freshmen has a vastly different mindset than that of many previous generations. Here are tips for HR professionals who want to prepare for the class of 2011.

item.title: Health Care Costs Moderate but Still Outpace Inflation
item.description: Health insurance premiums rose 6.1 percent in 2007, the lowest rate of increase since 1999, but that fact offered little solace to employers and workers, who have seen overall premium increases rise far faster than wages or inflation.

item.title: Captive Offshore Shared Services: Pros and Cons
item.description: Many variables dictate whether captive offshore shared services operations are advisable, a new report says.

item.title: Liability Insurance: Consultants Need To Keep Covered
item.description: Many independent consultants wonder whether they need liability insurance. The answer is a resounding 'yes.'
